sentences.en: "On going around with the boys, I guess." said Alfred.
sentences.cn: “我想是和朋友们一起出去，”艾尔弗雷德说。

sentences.en: Alfred Adler , a famous doctor, had an experience which illustrates this.
sentences.cn: 阿尔弗莱德-阿德勒是一位著名的医生, 他有过可以说明这点的经历.
阿佛烈在吃方面是有节制的.

sentences.en: Alfred shot him a sideways glance.
sentences.cn: 艾尔弗雷德斜眼瞥了他一下。

sentences.en: But Alfred had deduced that the Danes were no longer fit for prolonged battle.
sentences.cn: 但是,阿尔弗雷德已经推断出,丹麦人已不再适应持久的战争了.

sentences.en: Faced with the Danish advance, Alfred did not risk open battle.
sentences.cn: 对付丹麦军的进攻, 艾尔弗雷德尽力避开正面交锋.

sentences.en: He put out his hand to Alfred.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸向艾尔弗雷德。

sentences.en: He was clumsily trying to grab at Alfred's arms.
sentences.cn: 他笨手笨脚地想抓住艾尔弗雷德的手臂。

sentences.en: I admire Jay's and Alfred's translations, but I just do my own thing, my own take on what Murakami should sound like in English.
sentences.cn: 我很欣赏杰和阿尔弗雷德的译文，但我只会做我自己的事情。 我在翻译中坚持译文应该是地道的目标语言。

sentences.en: In ` Alfred the Great', ` the Great'is an epithet.
sentences.cn: "阿尔弗雷德大帝"中的"大帝 " 是个称号.

sentences.en: Neither Alfred nor I had had any training as teachers, and I at least had no books for the lessons in French, maths and physics that I was supposed to give.
sentences.cn: 阿尔弗雷德来自南罗得西亚，我俩谁也没有接受过任何正规的教学培训，至少，我连任何要教授的法语、数学和物理课程的书籍都没有。

sentences.en: Now Alfred began a long series of skirmishes.
sentences.cn: 然后,艾尔弗雷德发动了一系列的小规模战斗.

sentences.en: Now Alfred began a series of skirmishes.
sentences.cn: 接着阿尔弗雷德开展了一连串的小规模战斗.

sentences.en: She wondered if she ought to take some coffee out to Alfred.
sentences.cn: 她不知道自己是否应该给艾尔弗雷德端去咖啡。

sentences.en: The director of Psycho was Alfred Hitchcock.
sentences.cn: 《惊魂记》的导演正是艾弗列?希区考克.

sentences.en: Then Alfred went musing into the deserted schoolhouse. He was humiliated and angry.
sentences.cn: 他苦思冥想来到了空荡荡的教室, 感到受了羞辱,非常恼火.

sentences.en: Tom always felt very much the junior to Alfred.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在艾尔弗雷德面前高兴得象个小弟弟.

sentences.en: When Alfred Adler first postulated in 1908 that there existed an inborn instinct of aggression Freud argued against it.
sentences.cn: 当艾尔弗雷德·阿德勒于1908年首次提出人生来就有攻击性本能的假设时，弗洛伊德对此表示反对。

phrases.tran_cn: 阿尔弗雷德·希区柯克（英国导演）
阿尔弗雷德·诺贝尔（瑞典化学家）
